description: Configuration for filtering Authlete API endpoints in the search database
comment: This file controls which API endpoints are included or excluded from the search database based on ORGANIZATION_ACCESS_TOKEN compatibility

excluded_paths.reason: Service creation requires IdP API with ORGANIZATION_ACCESS_TOKEN
Service deletion requires IdP API with ORGANIZATION_ACCESS_TOKEN

idp_api.note: Only service creation and deletion operations are currently supported with ORGANIZATION_ACCESS_TOKEN. Other IdP API endpoints require different authentication mechanisms.
